member.name: IMFQualityManager.NotifyPresentationClock
member.summary: Called when the Media Session selects a presentation clock.
member.param: Pointer to the interface of the presentation clock. If this parameter is NULL, the quality manager should release any references to the presentation clock.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

member.name: IMFQualityManager.NotifyProcessInput
member.summary: Called when the media processor is about to deliver an input sample to a pipeline component.
member.param: Pointer to the interface of the topology node that represents the pipeline component.
Index of the input stream on the topology node.
Pointer to the interface of the input sample.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

member.name: IMFQualityManager.NotifyProcessOutput
member.summary: Called after the media processor gets an output sample from a pipeline component.
member.param: Pointer to the interface of the topology node that represents the pipeline component.
Index of the output stream on the topology node.
Pointer to the interface of the output sample.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

member.name: IMFQualityManager.NotifyQualityEvent
member.summary: Called when a pipeline component sends an MEQualityNotify event.
member.param: Pointer to the IUnknown interface of the object that sent the event. The object is either a Media Foundation transform (MFT) or a stream sink.
Pointer to the interface of the event.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

member.name: IMFQualityManager.NotifyTopology
member.summary: Called when the Media Session is about to start playing a new topology.
member.param: Pointer to the interface of the new topology. If this parameter is NULL, the quality manager should release any references to the previous topology.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

member.name: IMFQualityManager.Shutdown
member.summary: Called when the Media Session is shutting down.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

member.name: IMFQualityManager
member.summary: Adjusts playback quality. This interface is exposed by the quality manager.
